notes.text:
Hello,
I am reaching out because we are looking for strong marketing agency partners to provide certified white-label development for your agency projects. 

This includes SEO implementation, tracking and analytics setup, performance optimization, custom integrations, web development, and ongoing technical support.

We are a Europe-based team of certified e-commerce developers with expertise in Adobe Commerce (Magento is our superpower), Laravel, and other modern frameworks. 

Our team delivers scalable, reliable, and technical debt-free code. We are timezone agnostic, lean, and strong in communication, making it easy to integrate with your internal stakeholders.

I would be glad to discuss how we can support your project. 
Regards, Oskars

Partrick contacted me on email.

replied:
Hello Patrick,

Thank you for getting back to me. I just wanted to ask if your company needs any web development or support. If so, I would be happy to set up a Zoom call to discuss it further.

Best regards,
Oskars
